backend/main.mo: Canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles stored in a Map keyed by Principal with create and fetch methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the frontend and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling Internet Identity auth, profile onboarding, and authenticated UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Sign‑in/sign‑out button managing Internet Identity authentication and React Query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Public landing page with branding, feature highlights, and Internet Identity sign‑in.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header displaying logo, user avatar, and Internet Identity auth controls.
Layout wrapper providing hero background, header, footer, and page structure.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: User avatar component rendering a profile picture or initials with size variants.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Profile editing form that loads, previews, validates, and saves the user's profile and avatar image.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Initial onboarding form for creating a user profile with display name, bio, and optional avatar upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor, handling loading state tied to identity readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCurrentUserPro: Mutation hook for saving the caller's user profile and invalidating the profile query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, and plugin support for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state for a writing/reading app, including features, requirements, Internet Identity auth mandate, and required static image assets.
